subject: Football
Interscholastic Athletics
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Because of a refereeing mistake between Locust Grove and Frederick A. Douglass high schools, Oklahoma’s Class 3A football playoffs had hinged on a judge’s decision.
snippet: Because of a refereeing mistake between Locust Grove and Frederick A. Douglass high schools, Oklahoma’s Class 3A football playoffs had hinged on a judge’s decision.
